item.title: Why investors should care about Nvidia’s ‘very unusual’ relationship with CoreWeave
item.description: Nvidia is a significant investor in CoreWeave, and also sells the cloud company a lot of chips.

item.title: People are dining out less. That’s boosting Campbell’s meals-at-home business.
item.description: Campbell’s said its food and beverage unit booked a 15% jump in sales on strength in products such as Rao’s tomato sauce.

item.title: Scary headlines drive people to claim Social Security earlier – and that has real consequences

item.title: ‘You never know what might happen’: How do I make sure my son-in-law doesn’t get his hands on my daughter’s inheritance?
item.description: “So far, my daughter and her husband have a solid marriage.”
